contentList.content: Charge forward, pushing all objects and creatures in your path [1] away from you and deal them [2].This ability can produce force beams with [3] if become critical.
Charge forward, pushing all objects and creatures in your path [1] away from you and deal them [2].This ability can produce force beams with [3] if become critical.
Once per Battle for [1] turns you unleash True Terror. Your attacks become ALWAYS CRITICAL. +1 Action Point, +5 DEX, +50% faster Movement, Advantage on DEX rolls.
Once per Battle for [1] turns you unleash True Terror. Duration grows with your LeveL. Your attacks become ALWAYS CRITICAL. +1 Action Point, +10 DEX, +50% faster Movement, Advantage on DEX rolls.

Once per Battle for [1] turns you unleash True Terror. Your attacks become ALWAYS CRITICAL. +1 Action Point, +5 DEX, +50% faster Movement, Advantage on DEX rolls. When Cast unleash Powerful Shockwave that deals [2] in 5m radius and knocks enemies back for 3m.

Once per Battle for [1] turns you unleash True Terror. Duration grows with your LeveL. Your attacks become ALWAYS CRITICAL. +1 Action Point, +10 DEX, +50% faster Movement, Advantage on DEX rolls. When Cast unleash Powerful Shockwave that deals [2] in 5m radius and knocks enemies back for 3m.

+20% Spells Accuracy. +20% Critical Chance. 25% of Weapon Damage dealt - Reagin Hitpoints. 10% of Spells Damage dealt - Reagin Hitpoints. When you deal Critical hit, you produce Force beam to 3 targets in 6m that deals [1]. Attacks with this weapon can Scare the target. Swords damage and Enchanting grows with your progression. Weapon Provide powerfull Aura to Ally within 6m
LvL 1: Dexterity Modifier as Bonus Damage to everything. LvL 5: +5% Critical Chance. +1 INT, WIS, DEX. +2 III Spell Slots. LvL 10: +1 INT, WIS, DEX. +2 VI Spell Slots.
If you land a critical hit, you unleash beam with [1] to anyone in 7m.
Each cut of this blade shines with the wicked glint of adamantine - a promise for a devastating blow.
Though heavy, this longsword swings effortlessly in your hand - ready to take down a hundred enemies.
A nimble greatsword, heavy with the promise of broken bones.
Affected entity has [1] penalty to mental <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. When it is attacked, it takes an additional [2].

Enemies within [1] of range have [2] penalty to mental <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. The sword deals additional [3] damage to creatures affected by the shrieked.
All allies within [1] of range have [2] bonus to mental <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity +2</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage to Attacks</LSTag>
All allies within [1] of range have [2] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity +2</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage to Attacks</LSTag>
A nimble greatsword, heavy with the promise of broken bones.
+10% Critical Chanse. +15% Accuracy. +15% Vapmirism on Critical Hit. Critical Hit releases Critical Blow that Frightens targets in 4m radius.
Succesfull melee <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>. Deals [1] and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightens</LSTag> targets in 4m radius for 1 turn.
All Weapon Damage Reduced up to 80%. All Magic attacks Doubles your Spellcasting Ability Modifier as Bonus Damage. Your default Allegiance attacks become Demonic Beams with 16m range.
Wielder can choose Magic or Melee weapon Combat Mode. Allegiance Emits a Dusky Light that Strengthens allies and Weakens enemies in 8m radius.
Only in combat, when you kill an enemy, you gain his soul. The more souls you get the more <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SoulsTormentNumber_7500">Powerful</LSTag> you become. Forever.

Default Allegiance Form. +10% Crit chanse. +15% Accuracy. +15% Vapmirism on Critical Hit. Critical Hit releases Critical Blow that Frightens targets in 4m radius. For Dual wield attacks Bonus Action are not required.

Magical Allegiance Form. All Weapon Damage Reduced up to 80%. All Magic attacks Doubles your Spellcasting Ability Modifier as Bonus Damage. Your default Allegiance attacks become Demonic Beams with 16m range. If Critical Hit, Three more Demonic Beams will leap from the target up to 12m.
Produce demonic beam up to 18m, If Critical Three more Demonic Beams will leap from the target up to 12m. Skill damage power increased at 6,8,10 and 12 LvL.
Produce demonic beam up to 18m, If Critical Three more Demonic Beams will leap from the target up to 12m. Skill damage power increased at 6,8,10 and 12 LvL.

Make a melee attack with your Bloody Allegiance. Critical Hit releases Critical Blow that Frightens targets in 4m radius. Critical Hit will regain 15% of damage dealt. Skill damage power increased at 5 and 10 LvL.

Make a melee attack with your off-hand weapon. Critical Hit releases Critical Blow that Frightens targets in 4m radius. Critical Hit will regain 15% of damage dealt. Skill damage power increased at 5 and 10 LvL.
Emits a Dusky Light that Strengthens allies and Weakens enemies in 8m radius.

The owner of Bloody Allegiance deals an additional [1] with melee weapon attacks to enemies affected by the Sinister Oreol.
All allies within 8m of range have +2 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage to Attacks</LSTag>.
Bloody Allegiance damage and Enchanting grows with your progression.
The owner of Bloody Allegiance deals an additional [1] with melee weapon attacks to enemies affected by the Sinister Oreol.
All allies within 8m of range have +2 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage to Attacks</LSTag>
Once per Battle for [1] turns you unleash True Terror: +20% Critical Chance. +1 Action Point, Bonus Action. +5 DEX, Advantage on DEX rolls. +50% faster Movement.

Once per Battle for [1] turns you unleash True Terror: +20% Critical Chance. +1 Action Point, Bonus Action. +5 DEX, Advantage on DEX rolls. +50% faster Movement. When Cast unleash Powerful Shockwave that deals [2] in 5m radius and knocks enemies back for 3m.
Charge forward, pushing all objects and creatures in your path [1] away from you and deal them [2].

If you was damaged by enemy, once per turn, the Aegis retaliates with a Demonic Ray. This ability reduces your Armour Class by 5. +1 INT, WIS, CHA. +25% Increased Maximum Health. -2 to All Incoming Damage. Power grows each 3 LvLs. You can't be Charmed or Frightened. Aegis restore Full Health, Level I and II Spell Slot after each combat.
If the wielder got damage - strike back with a strong Demonic Ray that deals [2]. Aegis retaliates once per turn. This ability reduces your Armour Class by 5.
Aura that gives to allies within 8m of range: Immunity to Hellfire and Difficult Terrain +1 Armour Class each 6 LvLs. +50% movement speed.

Leap sinuously and smash into your foes, deal [1] and possibly knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>. Upon landing release a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DemonicShield_AURA">powerful aura</LSTag> that gives allies resistance to all damage in 3m radius.
Gives All damage resistance to All allies in a small 3m radius for [1].
When you receive damage, once per turn - strike back for [1] and push the creature up to 3m away from you.
When you receive damage, once per turn - Aegis retaliates with a beam for [1] in 20m range.

Releases Ancient Forgotten Power, Teleport to an area and deal [1] where you land. The impact blast spreads in a 5m zone, knoking all enemies back for [2] and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightens</LSTag> all targets.
Swing your weapon in a large arc to attack all enemies at once. Skill damage power increased at 5 and 10 LvL. Cannot be used with Bloody Allegiance Storm Screamer Form.
Release strong magic to attack All enemies in a large arc at once. Skill damage power increased at 6,8,10 and 12 LvL. Requires Bloody Allegiance Storm Screamer Form.

Inflicts Chest Trauma and Dazes. Target loses an action and can't take reactions and lose the Dexterity bonus to their Armour Class. Skill damage power increased at 5 and 10 LvL. Cannot be used with Bloody Allegiance Storm Screamer Form.

Make a fast double attack on creature and make them Bleed. If weapons are dually wielded make two attacks for both of them. Skill damage power increased at 5 and 10 LvL. Cannot be used with Bloody Allegiance Storm Screamer Form.

The weapon absorbs the energy of defeated souls, increasing the wielder's power by Impossible amounts . Losing or replacing a weapon will result in total loss of all powers. Applies after combat.
First stage, one defeated soul power. +5% all accuracy. +1 INT, DEX.
100 Defeated sould power. Stage II. All your attacks have a bonus [1]. +5% all accuracy. +1 INT, DEX, WIS. Gives ability to use Tormentor Appearance Spell.
250 Defeated souls power. Stage III. +10% all accuracy. +2 to All Stats. All your attacks have a bonus [1].
Stage IV. 500 Defeated souls power. +15% all accuracy. +3 to All Stats. All your attacks have a bonus [1]. Your attacks ignores Force resistance.

Stage V. 1000 Defeated souls power. +4 All Stats. +20% All Accuracy. +5% Critical chanse. All your attacks have a bonus [1]. Your attacks ignores Force resistance. Gives ability to use Tormentor Appearance Spell.

Stage VI. 2500 Defeated souls power. +5 All Stats. +25% All Accuracy. +10% Critical chanse. +50% Maximum Health. All your attacks have a bonus [1]. Your attacks ignores Force resistance. Gives ability to use Tormentor Appearance Spell.

Stage VII. 7500 Defeated souls power. +10 All Stats. +50% All Accuracy. +20% Critical chanse. +150% Maximum Health. All your attacks have a bonus [1]. Your attacks ignores Force resistance. Gives ability to use Tormentor Appearance Spell.

Number of souls defeated in combat. The more souls you defeat the more powerful you become by stages: <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SoulsTormentNumber_1">Stage I</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SoulsTormentNumber_100">Stage II</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SoulsTormentNumber_250">Stage III</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SoulsTormentNumber_500">Stage IV</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SoulsTormentNumber_1000">Stage V</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SoulsTormentNumber_2500">Stage VI</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SoulsTormentNumber_7500">Stage VII</LSTag>.
Hide or Apply Demonic Eyes effect added by your Death Embrace Stage.

Upon taking damage, performs an immediate retaliatory Ray of malice, summoning two Demonic Spirits of Bloody Allegiance.
Demonic ray deals [1] in 3m radius around the target.

Upon taking damage, performs an immediate retaliatory Ray of malice, summoning tree Demonic Spirits of Bloody Allegiance.
Demonic ray deals [1] in 3m radius around the target.
